basic.Target Organism: [Ref.24211019] Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC = 200 μg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC = 100 μg/mL), Staphylococcus epidermis (MIC > 200 μg/mL);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC = 200 μg/mL), Shigella dysentariae (MIC > 200 μg/mL), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC > 200 μg/mL), Klebsiella pneumonia (MIC > 200 μg/mL), Proteus mirabilis (MIC > 200 μg/mL), Pseudomonas aeuginose (MIC > 200 μg/mL).
